text:
An Indian medical student, who was in a coma at a trauma centre after being attacked by local goons in Russian city of Kazan, has died, External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj said on Wednesday.

“I am pained to inform that Yasir — a medical student from Srinagar — has succumbed to his injuries in Russia,” Ms. Swaraj tweeted.

Yasir was admitted to a trauma centre in Kazan, the capital city of Russian province of Tatarstan.

The External Affairs Minister said she had directed the Indian Embassy to send Yasir’s mortal remains to India as soon as possible. — PTI
title: Indian medico fatally attacked
